We're on Twitter

Jan 13, 2017

openvil

Check our Twitter feed for all the latest news and comments from our team at the Open Source Village. For those in China we're working on our Wechat feed too!

openvil

Our Big Open Source Technology List

Jan 04, 2017

openvil

We're building a big list of open source technologies that could be used in ecovillages, and we'd like your help to make it bigger and better.

We're using Trello to organize it - it's like a pinboard of cards that you can arrange into different categories. You can check out the list here, and if you'd like to contribute just contact us and we'll send you an invite link!
